text: Nagra Israeli vahera zamazeri so'e hunaku huanagi, Efraemi vahe'mofo kefo avu'avazamo'a eama nehigeno, Sameria vahe'mofona havi zamavu'zamava zamo'a zamagripina avite'ne. Zamagra kefo zamavu'zamava nehazage'za, musufa vahe'mo'za nona tagna nevazizage'za, megia musufa vahe'mo'za vano nehu'za vahe'mofo zana musufa enerize.
